{"id":1047901334,"question_id":724,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"6Â months, 2Â weeks","timestamp":1694560097,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"144 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1047901334/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"18 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def pivotIndex(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:\n\n        csum = 0\n        m_csum = {} # idx -> sum\n        \n        for idx, num in enumerate(nums): \n            \n            csum += num\n            m_csum[idx] = csum\n\n        for idx, num in enumerate(nums):\n\n            if m_csum.get(idx - 1, 0) == csum - m_csum.get(idx, 0):\n                return idx\n\n        return -1\n                  ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
